title: Secret Underground Military Bases - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/11/17
itunes:title: Secret Underground Military Bases - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/11/17
description:
George Noory, guest Garrett Graff and an anonymous caller discuss secret military bases built inside mountains designed to survive a nuclear attack on America, and the caller's experiences being inside one of the facilities.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
